about_the_game:
Give your female characters bells, braids, and beautiful outfits with the Another World Heroine Generator 5 for MZ pack! Gee-kun-soft is back with another set of generator parts for MZ, bringing us 40 new pieces. 5 AccB, 5 Eyes, 5 Front Hair, 5 Rear Hair, and 20 Clothing choices are ready to make new NPCs, party members, and even villains for your players to meet and fall in love with!

This pack also includes an edited version of the base body so that you can make sure your off-the-shoulder outfits look their best! Add new miko-inspired NPCs, powerful princess party members, and lifesaving nurses to your game with the Another World Heroine Generator 5 for MZ pack!

Features:

・Head accessories x 5
・Fantasy clothes × 20
・Eyes: 5 sets
・Front Hair: 5 Female
・Rear Hair: 5 Female

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
